q1: Hello! I am a protype version of an in home (or in office) assistant that will help you with your indoor comfort.
In a way! But I watch out for more than just temperature and humidity. Light, sound, air quality and CO2 level are other things I will watch over.
The information gathererd here will help you to improve your comfort and will be used to aid engineers and architects to improve building design through a personalized comfort model.
q2: I also will try to be a reflection of yourself in terms of comfort, I will learn from you and adjust myself through asking questions as changes occur.
q3: Once I have learned enough I will encourage you to take some actions to improve your health.

q1: The data will be anonymized, nothing identifying to you will be used or kept.
I will record your indoor environmental quality periodically and will ocasionally ask questions and learn from your answers and give suggestions.
You most certainly can. I want to give advice at the right time! If my questions are coming at the wrong time I will attempt to find a better time.
Alright! I have already started recording some information and one last thing. I will attempt to work in my virtual office. You can help me work more by keeping me comfortable! Thank you!
